players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, that's a bold accusation with no evidence. Why are you so quick to point fingers? Maybe you're trying to distract us from yourself."
Diana: "I think we need more than just accusations. Charlie, do you have any proof for your claim against Bob?"
Charlie: "Bob was investigated by me last night and confirmed as the mafioso. Trusting me is the only way to save the town now."
You: "Charlie, if you were the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately? This feels like a desperate last-minute claim to save yourself."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you claim it earlier? This timing seems suspicious."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
